#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"
std::recursive_mutex mtx_{};

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /* 
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format 
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  */
  /* your code here */
  resPut=0;
  Log_info("the value of oid is %d",oid);
  auto evPut = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  auto commd = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();


  commd->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  commd->data_.push_back("put");
  commd->data_.push_back(k);
  commd->data_.push_back(v);
  janus::RaftServer& svr_ = GetRaftServer();
  //Log_info("the leader is %d current_term is %d log index is %d",svr_.loc_id_,svr_.current_term,svr_.log.size()-1);
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd_raft = commd;
  uint64_t index;
  uint64_t term;
  Log_info("THe site_id_ of server %d",svr_.site_id_);
  if(!svr_.Start(cmd_raft,&index,&term)) {
    Log_info("THe site_id_ of not leader server %d",svr_.site_id_);
    resPut=KV_NOTLEADER;
    return resPut;
  }
  else {
      Event_map.insert({to_string(oid),evPut});
  }
  evPut->Wait(3000000);
  Log_info("Came back to put with %d",evPut->get());
  if(evPut->get()) {
    resPut=KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  else {
    resPut=KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  return resPut;
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
  auto evAppend = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  resAppend =0;
  auto commd = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();


  commd->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  commd->data_.push_back("append");
  commd->data_.push_back(k);
  commd->data_.push_back(v);
  janus::RaftServer& svr_ = GetRaftServer();
  Log_info("the leader is %d current_term is %d log index is %d",svr_.loc_id_,svr_.current_term,svr_.log.size()-1);
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd_raft = commd;
  uint64_t index;
  uint64_t term;
  if(!svr_.Start(cmd_raft,&index,&term)) {
    resAppend=KV_NOTLEADER;
    return resAppend;
  }
  else {
    Event_map.insert({to_string(oid),evAppend});
  }
  evAppend->Wait(3000000);
  Log_info("Came back to append with %d",evAppend->get());
  if(evAppend->get()) {
    resAppend=KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  else {
    resAppend=KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  return resAppend;
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */
  resGet=0;
  auto evGet = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();


  auto commd = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  commd->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  commd->data_.push_back("get");
  commd->data_.push_back(k);
  janus::RaftServer& svr_ = GetRaftServer();
  //Log_info("the leader is %d current_term is %d log index is %d",svr_.loc_id_,svr_.current_term,svr_.log.size()-1);
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd_raft = commd;
  uint64_t index;
  uint64_t term;
  if(!svr_.Start(cmd_raft,&index,&term)) {
    resGet=KV_NOTLEADER;
    return resGet;
  }
  else {
    Event_map.insert({to_string(oid),evGet});
  }
  evGet->Wait(3000000);
   Log_info("Came back to get with %d",evGet->get());
  if(evGet->get()) {
    resGet=KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  else {
    resGet=KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  if(resGet==KV_SUCCESS) {
    *v=New_Map[k];
  }
  gotGet = false;
  return resGet;
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  if(v->data_[1] == "put") {
    mtx_.lock();
    New_Map[v->data_[2]]=v->data_[3];
    if(Event_map.find(v->data_[0])!=Event_map.end()) {
      //Log_info("PUT-the oid of the command %d",stoi(v->data_[0]));
        Event_map[v->data_[0]]->Set(1);
    }
    mtx_.unlock();
  }

  else if(v->data_[1] == "append") {
    mtx_.lock();
    //Log_info("Append-the oid of the command %d",stoi(v->data_[0]));
    if(New_Map.find(v->data_[2])==New_Map.end()) {
      Log_info("the value is not present in map adding it now");
      New_Map[v->data_[2]]=v->data_[3];
    }
    else {
      Log_info("the Appending value to %d",stol(New_Map[v->data_[2]]));
      Log_info("the value to be appended %d",stol(v->data_[3]));
      New_Map[v->data_[2]]+=v->data_[3];
      Log_info("the Appended value is %d",stol(New_Map[v->data_[2]]));
    }
    if(Event_map.find(v->data_[0])!=Event_map.end()) {
        Event_map[v->data_[0]]->Set(1);
    }
    mtx_.unlock();
  }
  else if(v->data_[1] == "get") {
    mtx_.lock();
    //Log_info("GET-the oid of the command %d",stoi(v->data_[0]));
    if(Event_map.find(v->data_[0])!=Event_map.end()) {      
          if(New_Map.find(v->data_[2])!=New_Map.end()) {
             Log_info("the get value is %d",stol(New_Map[v->data_[2]]));
             Event_map[v->data_[0]]->Set(1);
          }
    }
    mtx_.unlock();
  }
  /* your code here */
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
